title: The Third Post
content: Petco Animal Supplies, Inc., or simply Petco, is an American pet retailer in the United States, with corporate offices in San Diego and San Antonio. Petco sells pet products and services, as well as certain types of live animals. Petco sells and holds fish, reptiles, small birds, hamsters, guinea pigs, and mice for adoption. Pet services include grooming and dog training. The company also owns the naming rights to the Petco Park baseball stadium, which is home of the San Diego Padres.

title: The Fourth Post
content: Curious what you’ll be able to achieve by the end of our web development program? Our current students are graduating on Wednesday, July 29th, and they can’t wait to inspire you by presenting their capstone projects. This virtual event is open to people considering a career in software development, potential employers, and friends and family of the grads. Come see what you can do with Codeup!
